mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inviter_phone AS "inviterPhone", a.invitee_phone AS "inviteePhone", a.invite_time AS "inviteTime", a.success_time AS "successTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT inviter_phone as phone, count(distinct (invitee_phone)) as successCount FROM tbl_invite a
a.del_flag = 0 AND a.success_time IS NOT NULL
AND a.invite_time > #{start}
AND #{end} > a.invite_time
GROUP BY a.inviter_phone
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_invite( id, inviter_phone, invitee_phone, invite_time, success_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inviterPhone}, #{inviteePhone}, #{inviteTime}, #{successTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_invite SET id = #{id}, inviter_phone = #{inviterPhone}, invitee_phone = #{inviteePhone}, invite_time = #{inviteTime}, success_time = #{successTime} WHERE id = #{id}
